name: Latvian Lessor Association
goal:
Latvian Leasing association was established on 17 October 2000. The association unites Latvian biggest leasing companies.
The association ensures leasing companiesâ€™ interests, provides regular statistics summaries about Latvian leasing operation indicator, analysing market tendencies both in general and separately as well as taking care of its availability for Latvian society.
interests: Communication, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives: EU structural support, regulation in field of financial  products and services
